It would be nice for us, if we could override the "max-document-download"
s=
etting, i.e have it defined pr. domain
We are planning to crawl a bunch of =
domains in a single job, but need to
set a limit to the number of objects c=
rawled for each of the domains.

This seems not to be possible in the curre=
nt version of heritrix.
Maybe this could be implemented instead as a proces=
sor.
Suggestions are very welcome.

regards
